ayas.translation: By the Dawn
And ten nights,
And the Even and the Odd,
And the night when it departeth,

ayas.arabic: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
ayas.translation: There surely is an oath for thinking man.
ayas.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamul lidhī ḥijr

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
ayas.translation: Dost thou not consider how thy Lord dealt with (the tribe of) A'ad,
ayas.transliteration: alam tara kayfa fa`ala rabbuka bi`ād

ayas.translation: With many-columned Iram,

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
ayas.translation: The like of which was not created in the lands;
ayas.transliteration: allatī lam yukhlaq mithluhā fil bilād

ayas.translation: And with (the tribe of) Thamud, who clove the rocks in the valley;
ayas.transliteration: wathamūdal ladhīna jābuṣ ṣakhra bil wād

ayas.translation: And with Pharaoh, firm of might,
Who (all) were rebellious (to Allah) in these lands,
And multiplied iniquity therein?
Therefore thy Lord poured on them the disaster of His punishment.
Lo! thy Lord is ever watchful.

ayas.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
ayas.translation: As for man, whenever his Lord trieth him by honouring him, and is gracious unto him, he saith: My Lord honoureth me.
ayas.transliteration: fa-ammal-insānu idhā mab-talāhu rabbuhu fa-akramahu wana``amahu fayaqūlu rabbī akraman

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ
ayas.translation: But whenever He trieth him by straitening his means of life, he saith: My Lord despiseth me.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammā idhā mab-talāhu faqadara `alayhi rizqahu fayaqūlu rabbī ahānan

ayas.translation: Nay, but ye (for your part) honour not the orphan
And urge not on the feeding of the poor.
And ye devour heritages with devouring greed.
And love wealth with abounding love.

ayas.arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
ayas.translation: Nay, but when the earth is ground to atoms, grinding, grinding,
And thy Lord shall come with angels, rank on rank,
ayas.transliteration: wajā-a rabbuka wal malaku ṣaffan ṣaffā

ayas.arabic: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
ayas.translation: And hell is brought near that day; on that day man will remember, but how will the remembrance (then avail him)?
ayas.transliteration: wajī-a yawma-idhin bijahannam ۚ yawma-idhiy yatadhakkarul-insānu wa-annā lahudh dhikrā

ayas.translation: He will say: Ah, would that I had sent before me (some provision) for my life!
None punisheth as He will punish on that day!
None bindeth as He then will bind.
But ah! thou soul at peace!
Return unto thy Lord, content in His good pleasure!
Enter thou among My bondmen!
Enter thou My Garden!
